tasks.task: Timing and location considerations for soil sampling.
subtasks: Determine optimal soil sampling time relative to plant growth stage.
Avoid sampling contaminated areas near roads, tracks, watering points, etc.
Compare soil samples from problem areas versus healthy areas to identify issues.
Understand that key nutrients are in the top 30cm and sample this depth.
If subsoil issues are suspected, sample to greater depth.
Dig a hole to retrieve a soil profile section.
Test sampled soil for pH, sodicity, and texture.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Timing and location considerations for soil sampling.
subtasks: Determine optimal soil sampling time relative to plant growth stage.
Avoid sampling contaminated areas such as roads, tracks, watering points, and fence lines.
Compare soil samples from problem areas with healthy areas to identify specific issues.
Sample the top 30 centimeters where key nutrients are concentrated.
Consider sampling deeper if subsoil issues are suspected.
Dig a hole to retrieve a soil profile section.
Test sampled soil for pH, sodicity, and texture.
